org.openbel.framework.common.cfg
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.cfg.Configuration
Direct Known Subclasses:
RuntimeConfiguration, SystemConfiguration
public abstract class Configuration
extends Object

This class encapsulates a file-based configuration.

This class contains a set of variables that will be automatically expanded if found as a value within a configuration file.

{tmp}
Expanded to the system temporary directory.
{home}
Expanded to the user's home directory.
{name}
Expanded to the user's name.
{dir}
Expanded to the current working directory.

Field Detail

COMMENT

public static final String COMMENT
The comment prefix, "#". Lines beginning with this string will be ignored.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NAME_VALUE_DELIMITER

public static final String NAME_VALUE_DELIMITER
The delimiter, "=". Name-value pairs are separated in configuration files by this string.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

protected final File configurationFile
The configuration file associated with this configuration, which may be null.

Configuration

protected Configuration(File file)
Creates a configuration instance associated with the supplied file.

Parameters:
file - File to use as configuration; may be null
Method Detail

init

protected void init()
             throws IOException
Reads the configuration file, resulting in processSetting callbacks. If the configuration file cannot be read, initializeDefaults will be called.

Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs

protected abstract void processSetting(String name,
                                       String value)

Parameters:
name - Non-null name
value - Non-null value

protected abstract Map<String,String> defaults()

defaultConfiguration

protected String defaultConfiguration()
Returns the default configuration provided by defaults().

Returns:
Non-null string

read

public void read()
          throws IOException
Reads configurationFile, invoking processSetting(String, String) as name-value pairs are encountered.

Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs
IllegalStateException - If read() has been called with a null configuration file

valueSubstitution

public static String valueSubstitution(String value)
Performs substitution against the configuration value for the system's temporary directory, user's home directory, user's name, or user's current working directory.

Parameters:
value - Non-null string
Returns:
String resulting from value replacement
